title: RBI cautions against surge in private credit between corporates and non-banks
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) warns of systemic risks from the rapid growth of private credit, which has quadrupled in the past decade, especially due to its opacity and interconnectedness with banks and non-banks. The RBI highlights potential vulnerabilities in this segment, including the risk of sharp losses during a credit cycle downturn and challenges posed by complex structures and liquidity risks.
